title: The Writer's Almanac Wednesday, April 6, 2022
description: On this day in 1748, excavations began to unearth the doomed city of Pompeii, the city buried in ash after the 79 BCE eruption of Mount Vesuvious.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1748, excavations began to unearth the doomed city of Pompeii, the city buried in ash after the 79 BCE eruption of Mount Vesuvious.
